Title: An Act Further Extending the Effectivity of Batas Pambansa Bilang 25 to June 30, 1985
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 867
An Act Further Extending the Effectivity of Batas Pambansa Bilang 25 to June 30, 1985
Section 1. The effectivity of Batas Pambansa Bilang 25 as extended by Presidential Decree No. 1912 up to December 31, 1984 is hereby further extended to June 30, 1985.
Section 2. Any existing law or decree contrary to this Act is hereby repealed, amended, or modified accordingly.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: December 28, 1984
